titleStmt.title: Mr. Denzell Hollis His speech to the Lords concerning the setling of the Queen of Bohemia and her electorall family in their right and inheritance with restitution for their sufferings July 9, 1641.
Speech to the Lords concerning the setling of the Queen of Bohemia and her electoral family in their right and inheritance
titleStmt.author: Holles, Denzil Holles, Baron, 1599-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
